name: HIVTests
title: HIV Tests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: A value set used in the Office of Population Affairs Title X Family Planning Annual Report (FPAR).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests for HIV, used to retrieve and populate dates for Human Immunodeficiency Virus labs.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: HIV 2 Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

HIV 1 RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and target amplification method
HIV 1 Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoblot
HIV 1 Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
